fields.label: Emplois listed in VS?

fields.description: Arranger of keyboard reduction of vocal score

fields.description: Number of pages in vocal score

fields.description: Librettist of original form of work

fields.description: Composer of original form of work

fields.label: Original Title
fields.description: Title of orginal form of work

fields.label: Tableaux
fields.description: Number of tableaux in addition to number of acts
